events.comment: if button is clikced, go to quiz
for more examples and templates visit gametemplates.itch.io
initialize the quiz game for the first time
select answer with the left mouse button
after selecting an answer, we start a timer, and highlight the correct/incorrect answer after 3 seconds
update the score text to display the current amount of money and the guaranteed money we have
after highlighting the correct answer if the user picked the correct answer we start a timer, and pick a new question after 3 seconds
use help to delete 2 answers
if we Stop the game, we win the current money
if game over either because we win 1,000,000 or lost, wait few seconds and then win the guaranteed money and go to game over scene
set text to display the value the player won using the global variable
center text on the screen
if button clicked, play again

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: ddabrahim, gametemplates.itch.io
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: QuizExtension
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: An extension to help with making quizes

eventsFunctions.name: PickRandomQuestion
eventsFunctions.sentence: Pick a random question and display with the texts _PARAM1_,  _PARAM2_, _PARAM3_, _PARAM4_, _PARAM5_ and background _PARAM6_

events.comment: reset the color of the background image of the answers as we might change them previously to display he correct, wrong and selected answers.
reset the color of the background as we changed it before when highlighted the result
reset the variable so we can select an answer again
reset and pause the timer used to pick a new question, it will unpaused once we picked the correct answer
increase question count by 1
if the variable delete2AnswerUsed is 2, that means it was disabled only temporarily and enable it again by setting the value back to 0
Get difficulty and pick a random question

if the question has been already picked, pick on other one and repeat while find one that has not been picked before to make sure the same question does picked twice during the game
Note that, if no more question found, you create an infinite loop and the game will freeze here, make sure you don't pick a question more times than how many questions you have
update text objects to display title and answer of the question we picked
center the title text
reset canSelect object variable of backgrounds so we can select them again in case we did use the Delete2Answer help before
pick the right answer
mark question as picked so we don't pick it again

eventsFunctions.sentence: Highlight the correct/incorrect answer using background sprites _PARAM1_

events.comment: reset and pasue the timer used to highlight the answer
mark correct answer with green

if the answer the user picked and the correct answer is different, change color of user picked answer to red
also set the variable delete2AnswerUsed to 1 so we can not delete incorrect answers after we have the results
if the answer the user picked and the correct answer is the same, start a timer to pick a new question in update
increase the amount of money we currently have using the question count and question values
set difficuly of next question based on the current question count
set guaranteed money using the question value of the current question
set guaranteed money using the question value of the current question
set guaranteed money using the question value of the current question
if it was the 10th question, that means we won $1000,000 and GAME OVER we are billionaire
set guaranteed money using the question value of the current question
set variable to be game over, we Win!

parameters.description: Must be an object group that contains all text objects displaying the answers
parameters.name: AnswersGroup

eventsFunctions.description: Initialize the quiz game engine and load questions we can choose from during the game, make sure you run this action first at the beginning of the scene before anything else
eventsFunctions.fullName: Initialize Quiz game engine (must be the first thing to call!)
eventsFunctions.name: InitializeQuizGameEngine

events.comment: define some variables required for the quiz game so we don't need to do this outside the extension in the scene events manually
define which question worth how much money and store it in a structure
initialize the timers we are going to use for displaying the correct/incorrect answer

We store quiz questions in structure variables so it works on ALL platforms and with the online build service.
In case you do store your questions in external file, you still need to load them in to structures here in order to work with the extension
The structure variable is organized as quizextension_questions.difficulty.number.Title,A,B,C,D, Solution and Picked

-quizextension_questions: the structure variable itself
-easy,medium,hard,billionare: this child mark the difficulty of the question we use this to pick a question of selected difficulty
-number: the number of the question in the structure, it must be in order 1,2,3..etc this is the number we use to pick a random question from the structure
-Title: this child contain the actual question
-A,B,C,D: this childs contains the answers for the question
-Solution: this child contan the letter of the corrent answer A,B,C or D
-Picked: this child is used to mark the question as picked so we don't pick the same question twice during the game

eventsFunctions.description: Select an answer using the background images of the answers
eventsFunctions.name: SelectAnswer
eventsFunctions.sentence: Select answer using the background sprites _PARAM1_

events.comment:
change color of selected background image and unpause the timer to highlight the correct answer
also we set the variable canSelect to 0 so we can not select an answer again

if the value of the variable delete2AnswerUsed is 0 that means it is still available to us and set value to 2 so we can not use this help while we are waiting for the result
the 2 means, we disable it only temporary we are going to reset back to 0 when we pick a new question

events.comment: delete text of two text objects displaying the incorrect answer, we can do this only once in the game
we set the variable delete2AnswerUsed to 1 which means we used the help, we should be unable to use it again from now on
change the animation of the button to indicate we can no longer use it
